blimpcontrol.gyroscope

Gyroscope module for the blimpcontrol library.

class blimpcontrol.gyroscope.Gyroscope(bus: int, addr: int)

Bases: object

A class to represent the gyroscope.

Parameters:

  • bus (int) – The I2C bus number.

  • addr (int) – The I2C address of the gyroscope.

get_x() → int

Get the raw X-axis gyroscope value. Placeholder for specific gyroscope (e.g., BMI270: GYR_X_LSB 0x12, GYR_X_MSB 0x13).

Returns:

The raw X-axis gyroscope value.

Return type:

int

Example:

gyro.get_x()

get_y() → int

Get the raw Y-axis gyroscope value. Placeholder for specific gyroscope (e.g., BMI270: GYR_Y_LSB 0x14, GYR_Y_MSB 0x15).

Returns:

The raw Y-axis gyroscope value.

Return type:

int

Example:

gyro.get_y()

get_z() → int

Get the raw Z-axis gyroscope value. Placeholder for specific gyroscope (e.g., BMI270: GYR_Z_LSB 0x16, GYR_Z_MSB 0x17).

Returns:

The raw Z-axis gyroscope value.

Return type:

int

Example:

gyro.get_z()

get_xyz() → List[int]

Get the raw X, Y, and Z-axis gyroscope values.

Returns:

A list containing [X, Y, Z] gyroscope values.

Return type:

list[int]

Example:

gyro.get_xyz()

close() → None

Close the I2C bus connection.
